Text: rambam is the man!  it's got a nice ring to it ...
"Fucking North Korea" is right! There really are quite a few people scattered around on this planet that don't deserve anything other than fucking death. Goddam scumbag troublemakers!

""Fucking North Korea" is right! There really are quite a few people scattered around on this planet that don't deserve anything other than fucking death. Goddam scumbag troublemakers!"

A small coterie of self-interested elites backed by a cynical superpower leading it's peasantry to potential doom. There are parallels to Nazi Germany here, but only peripherally. If we (and the Chinese) are patient and fairly careful, this idiotic regime will collapse sooner or later. NK is like a crazed chihuahua (Bill Mahar's words) barking at you from inside a locked car. Starling, but not a real threat. If those damned fools actually try something, We and SK will crush them. It's mathematical.
